onboarding.slides.title: Welcome to your Cardano Foundation Identity Wallet
onboarding.slides.description: A secure and easy-to-use tool that allows you to manage your digital identity and control your personal data

onboarding.slides.title: Securerly manage your digital identity
onboarding.slides.description: Securely manage your digital identity and share your personal data with confidence

onboarding.slides.title: Take control of your personal data
onboarding.slides.description: Say goodbye to the days of handing over your personal data to third-party companies

onboarding.slides.title: Verify your identity with ease
onboarding.slides.description: Verify your identity for various online services, without sharing unnecessary personal information

onboarding.slides.title: Experience the power of decentralized identity
onboarding.slides.description: As a decentralized identity platform, you take control of your digital identity and your personal data
